title: Bacon Wrapped Chilli Prawns
ingredients: ['120ml vegetable oil', '1/4 tablespoon lime juice', '1 clove garlic, finely chopped', 'salt and pepper to taste', '10 medium prawns, shelled and deveined', '5 rashers streaky bacon, cut in half', '1/2 (215g) tin whole green chillies, drained and sliced lengthways', '1 avocado, peeled, pitted and diced', '1 lime, cut into wedges']
